attributes.action: To Stop the increase of Council Tax in Enfield.
attributes.additional_details: Because it is unfear to CHARGE PEOPLE FOR NOTHING.
attributes.background: I want  Enfield council to Stop increase of Council Tax. And start again collecting every week bins.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Council tax rates are set by individual councils.

You may wish to contact your council about the services in your area: https://new.enfield.gov.uk/
